name: Nine-Fruit Nectar
desc: A blended juice cocktail. Mixed with balanced precision, the drink interweaves the flavors of various fruits and preserves their sweet and tangy deliciousness, elevated by a handful of ice cubes.

customize.name: Recipe: Nine-Fruit Nectar
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Nine-Fruit Nectar.

customize.name: Delicious Nine-Fruit Nectar
customize.desc: A blended juice cocktail. With just one sip, you feel like you've been enveloped in a waterfall of fruit. The sweet aroma of nature's bounty fills your nostrils â€” each mouthful a perfect harmony of fruity flavors. When the heatwaves strike, this drink is sure to provide salvation for the soul!

customize.name: Suspicious Nine-Fruit Nectar
customize.desc: A blended juice cocktail. It's sour and bitter on the palate... and somehow manages to have a salty aftertaste? Every sensation seems present except for the sweetness you desire. Such a complex and unusual flavor profile... Did someone accidentally introduce a medicinal concoction to the mix?

customize.name: Nine-Fruit Nectar
customize.desc: A blended juice cocktail. Mixed with balanced precision, the drink interweaves the flavors of various fruits and preserves their sweet and tangy deliciousness, elevated by a handful of ice cubes.

customize.name: Zaytun Peach
customize.desc: The fruit of a forest shrub. Its flesh is firm and sweet. It is said to have a calming effect on the mind.

customize.name: Sunsettia
customize.desc: A plump fruit, beautiful like the sunset, that is abundant across all of Teyvat. It has a curious, sweet aroma and is able to energize an individual.

customize.name: Apple
customize.desc: Crisp and fragrant. Delicious raw or made into wine.

customize.name: Berry
customize.desc: Small, brightly-colored fruit. They can be found everywhere, and the taste of them wipes the fatigue of a long journey away.

value.text: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 15% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
